    • noConflicts

      public static boolean noConflicts(LocalDateTime newApptStart, LocalDateTime newApptEnd, int customerID, int apptID)
      Returns a boolean after checking if there are any conflicts between the new appointment and existing ones for a specific customer
      Parameters:
      newApptStart - LocalDateTime of the start of the new appointment
      newApptEnd - LocalDateTime of the end of the new appointments
      customerID - int ID of the customer
      Returns:
      true if there are no conflicts, false otherwise
      See Also:
      • getCustomerAppointmentsExceptThisOne(int, int)

    • getCustomerAppointmentsExceptThisOne

      Returns list of Appointments for a customer except for the one passed
      Parameters:
      custID - the ID of the customer to check
      apptID - the ID of the appointment not returned
      Returns:
      list of Appointments

    • isInBusinessHours

      Returns a boolean after checking if the new appointment is in business hours
      Parameters:
      apptStartLDT - LocalDateTime of the new appointment start
      apptEndLDT - LocalDateTime of the new appointment end
      Returns:
